prompt: Create a Terms & Conditions screen with a luxurious, elegant design. The app bar should have a deep gold background with the title 'Terms & Conditions' in a bold, white serif font, centered. Include a white back arrow icon. The main content area should be a scrollable section with a cream background, displaying the terms text in a dark brown font with 1.6 line spacing, inside a card with ornate rounded corners and a subtle gold border. The sticky footer should contain a 'Decline' button (gold border, dark brown text) on the left and an 'Accept' button (deep gold background, white text) on the right. Use generous padding and ensure a responsive, sophisticated layout.
